data.message: Million Dollar Neighborhood, filmed by ForceFour Entertainment in Aldergrove BC Canada.     Yo Shady, check me out sometime !!  It can be found online for free, it was aired via Oprah Winfrey Own Network Canada.   Mind you, very little of ME aired.    I busted my friggin' ass.   4 months of my life given to a TV Show that couldn't at least give me air time for the talent i DO have that is worth promoting.   I am a really talented singer/songwriter & performer.   It sucks really.   UGH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
